name: Elementalz (LumiCandle)
description:
Enter into an unknown world where you find yourself in a strange land. Collect different elemental cards to increase your deck, and use them to fight elemental bosses and defensive turrets that you will encounter throughout the land!

Controls: 

Use WASD keys to move the player.

Press F to pick up cards from the ground.

Press R to Reload

Hold R to shuffle Card Deck

Hold down the Left Mouse button to charge a card and release to shoot it

Tip: If you notice a creature has a crystal node on its body, aim for that to deal extra damage!!
